verses.verse: The book <S%G976><s%> of the genealogy <S%G1078><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>
To Abraham <S%G11><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Isaac; <S%G2464><s%> and to Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> Jacob; <S%G2384><s%> and to Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> Judah <S%G2455><s%> and his brothers; <S%G80><s%>

and to Judah <S%G2455><s%> were born <S%G1080><s%> Perez <S%G5329><s%> and Zerah <S%G2196><s%> by Tamar; <S%G2283><s%> and to Perez <S%G5329><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Hezron; <S%G2074><s%> and to Hezron, <S%G2074><s%> Ram; <S%G689><s%>
and to Ram <S%G689><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Amminadab; <S%G284><s%> and to Amminadab, <S%G284><s%> Nahshon; <S%G3476><s%> and to Nahshon, <S%G3476><s%> Salmon; <S%G4533><s%>

and to Salmon <S%G4533><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Boaz <S%G1003><s%> by Rahab; <S%G4460><s%> and to Boaz <S%G1003><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Obed <S%G7098><s%> by Ruth; <S%G4503><s%> and to Obed, <S%G7098><s%> Jesse; <S%G2421><s%>

and to Jesse <S%G2421><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> David <S%G7035><s%> the king. <S%G935><s%> And to David <S%G7035><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> by her [who had been the wife] of Uriah; <S%G3774><s%>
and to Solomon <S%G4672><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Rehoboam; <S%G4497><s%> and to Rehoboam, <S%G4497><s%> Abijah; and to Abijah, Asa; <S%G7><s%>
and to Asa <S%G760><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Jehoshaphat; <S%G2498><s%> and to Jehoshaphat, <S%G2498><s%> Joram; <S%G2496><s%> and to Joram, <S%G2496><s%> Uzziah; <S%G3604><s%>
and to Uzziah <S%G3604><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Jotham; <S%G2488><s%> and to Jotham, <S%G2488><s%> Ahaz; <S%G881><s%> and to Ahaz, <S%G881><s%> Hezekiah; <S%G1478><s%>
and to Hezekiah <S%G1478><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Manasseh; <S%G3128><s%> and to Manasseh, <S%G3128><s%> Amon; <S%G300><s%> and to Amon, <S%G300><s%> Josiah; <S%G2502><s%>
and to Josiah <S%G2502><s%> were born <S%G1080><s%> Jeconiah <S%G2423><s%> and his brothers, <S%G80><s%> at the time <S%G1909><s%> of the deportation <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon. <S%G897><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> the deportation <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon, <S%G897><s%> to Jeconiah <S%G2423><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Shealtiel; <S%G4528><s%> and to Shealtiel, <S%G4528><s%> Zerubbabel; <S%G2216><s%>
and to Zerubbabel <S%G2216><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Abihud; <S%G10><s%> and to Abihud, <S%G10><s%> Eliakim; <S%G1662><s%> and to Eliakim, <S%G1662><s%> Azor; <S%G107><s%>
and to Azor <S%G107><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Zadok; <S%G4524><s%> and to Zadok, <S%G4524><s%> Achim; <S%G885><s%> and to Achim, <S%G885><s%> Eliud; <S%G1664><s%>
and to Eliud <S%G1664><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Eleazar; <S%G1648><s%> and to Eleazar, <S%G1648><s%> Matthan; <S%G3102><s%> and to Matthan, <S%G3102><s%> Jacob; <S%G2384><s%>

and to Jacob <S%G2384><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of Mary, <S%G3137><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who is called <S%G3004><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the generations <S%G1074><s%> from Abraham <S%G11><s%> to David <S%G7035><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> and from David <S%G7035><s%> to the deportation <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon <S%G897><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> and from the deportation <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon <S%G897><s%> to [the time of] Christ <S%G5547><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations. <S%G1074><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the birth <S%G1078><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was as follows. <S%G3779><s%> When His mother <S%G3384><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> had been betrothed <S%G3423><s%> to Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> they came <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> she was found <S%G2147><s%> to be with child <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

And Joseph <S%G2501><s%> her husband, <S%G435><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man, <S%G1342><s%> and not wanting <S%G2309><s%> to disgrace <S%G1165><s%> her, desired <S%G1014><s%> to put <S%G630><s%> her away <S%G630><s%> secretly. <S%G2977><s%>

But when he had considered <S%G1760><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> to him in a dream, <S%G3677><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> do not be afraid <S%G5399><s%> to take <S%G3880><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> as your wife; <S%G1135><s%> for that which has been conceived <S%G1080><s%> in her is of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

"And she will bear <S%G5088><s%> a Son; <S%G5207><s%> and you shall call <S%G2564><s%> His name <S%G3686><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> for it is He who will save <S%G4982><s%> His people <S%G2992><s%> from their sins. <S%G266><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> took <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> that what <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G3004><s%> by the Lord <S%G2962><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the virgin <S%G3933><s%> shall be with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> and shall bear <S%G5088><s%> a Son, <S%G5207><s%> and they shall call <S%G2564><s%> His name <S%G3686><s%> Immanuel, <S%G1694><s%>" which <S%G3739><s%> translated <S%G3177><s%> means, <S%G1510><s%> "God <S%G2316><s%> with us."

And Joseph <S%G2501><s%> arose <S%G1453><s%> from his sleep, <S%G5258><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> as the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%> him, and took <S%G3880><s%> [her] as his wife, <S%G1135><s%>

and kept <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1097><s%> her a virgin <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1097><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> she gave <S%G5088><s%> birth <S%G5088><s%> to a Son; <S%G5207><s%> and he called <S%G2564><s%> His name <S%G3686><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
